title: Washington Journal: Dr. Chris Beyrer Discusses Covid-19 Vaccine Development
description: Johns Hopkins University Bloomberg School of Public Health epidemiologist Dr. Chris Beyrer talked about the development, efficacy, and safety of a COVID-19 vaccine.
